whatweoffer.about: Nestled in a privileged natural setting, our villa offers two fully equipped units that can be rented independently or as a single interconnected complex for a max of 10 people, providing flexibility and privacy according to your needs.  Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen, ideal for preparing your favorite dishes, as well as a jacuzzi designed for absolute relaxation.
whatweoffer.about-2: Enjoy a charming front porch and back porch, perfect for admiring the surrounding nature. From every corner of the property, you can delight in the impressive and majestic views of the Arenal Volcano. Easily reserve a villa or the entire complex through WhatsApp and enjoy a truly unique and unforgettable lodging experience.
whatweoffer.volcano-views-desc: Wake up to stunning views of Arenal Volcano from your window every morning.
whatweoffer.modern-comfort-desc: Enjoy AC, wifi, and comfortable beds in a natural, peaceful setting.
whatweoffer.adv-door-desc: Easy access to hot springs, hiking trails, and rainforest adventures.

faq.question1: How close are you to Arenal Volcano?
faq.answer1: We are just a 10-minute drive from the entrance to Arenal Volcano National Park and less than 5 minutes from downtown La Fortuna. You’ll enjoy stunning views of the volcano right from the property!
faq.answer2: Yes, we offer free private parking on-site for all guests. The area is secure and easily accessible for all vehicle types.
faq.question3: Are local tours and activities available?
faq.answer3: Absolutely! We can help you book popular activities like hot springs, ziplining, waterfall hikes, volcano tours, and more. Ask us for recommendations — we love helping guests plan their adventures!

terms-and-conditions.pageDescription: Read our house rules and return policy to ensure a pleasant stay.
terms-and-conditions.title: Terms & Return Policy
terms-and-conditions.intro: Welcome to Arenal Volcanic Villas! We’re delighted to host you and hope your stay is both comfortable and relaxing. To ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience for everyone, we kindly ask that you follow a few important guidelines during your stay.
terms-and-conditions.rule1: Check-in is available from 3:00 PM with self-check-in via our smart lock. Please use the access code provided and ensure it is not shared with anyone not registered as a guest. Check-out time is at the agreed-upon time, and we ask that all doors and windows be securely closed before leaving.
terms-and-conditions.rule2: Wi-Fi is provided for your convenience, and we ask that it is used responsibly. Please avoid any illegal downloads or activities that could compromise the network.
terms-and-conditions.rule3: For the safety and comfort of all guests, smoking is not permitted inside the villa, and parties or events are strictly prohibited. Quiet hours are observed from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM, and overnight stays are limited to registered guests only. Pets are welcome with prior approval and a small additional fee. Guests are asked to dispose of garbage and recycling in the designated areas and to treat the villa and its furnishings with care.
terms-and-conditions.rule4: Our Jacuzzi is available for your enjoyment, and we ask that you follow the provided guidelines to ensure safety and hygiene. Please shower before entering, do not use glass containers, and limit use to 15–30 minutes at a time. Children under 12 must be supervised, and guests with health concerns or who are pregnant should consult a doctor before use. Always turn off the jets and lights after use, and replace the cover to keep the water clean and retain heat. Avoid using soaps, oils, bubble bath, or tampering with water or chemical settings.
terms-and-conditions.rule5: Guests are responsible for their own safety when using property amenities. The host is not liable for injuries resulting from misuse, negligence, or failure to follow posted guidelines. Please leave the villa in good condition; any damages or excessive cleaning required may result in additional charges.
terms-and-conditions.rule6: In case of emergencies, dial 911, or contact the nearest hospital, Clínica Sanar. For any other questions or concerns, please reach out to us via the Airbnb app, by phone at +506 83095411, or by email at mongekm7@gmail.com.
terms-and-conditions.closing: Thank you for choosing Arenal Volcanic Villas. By staying with us, you agree to these policies, and we truly appreciate your cooperation in helping us maintain a safe, comfortable, and enjoyable environment. We hope you enjoy your stay and make the most of everything our beautiful location has to offer!
